snippet: About 100,000 people have fled fighting near the capital, Tripoli, in the past three weeks, adding to a growing problem of internal displacement, the United Nations refugee agency said.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency reports that about 100,000 people have fled fighting near Libyan capita of Tripoli in past three weeks, adding to growing problem of internal displacement.
lead_paragraph: About 100,000 people have fled fighting near the capital, Tripoli, in the past three weeks, adding to a growing problem of internal displacement, the United Nations refugee agency said.
